values:
Can I please continue to forget about this account month after month after month....


ANYWAYS!


I just can't seem to have my life straightened out for more than a few days at a time. Since my last entry I've gone to 3 funerals... One of substancial meaning to me.. one which was a shock, and one as a support. 


I've started seeing someone and it's getting rather serious. Thinking about shackin up together (not just because.... my roomate informed me last night that he's going to move back with his mom in a few months.. Cool huh?) 


I'm pretty theatre involved latly.. I'm an equity actress which is pretty badass... plus I got a raise at one of my jobs. Woo


Meh. I give up on staying focused. I gotta go to bed.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/9371.html

Ok so.. original guy I wrote about when I started this dag thing?







He's in town... and we're going to go take a walk and talk and catch up in the park where we used to take our long romantic walks....









I haven't seen him since that one night...







I'm surprisingly nervous... and excited.. and I feel like I'm going to puke and cry at the same time....
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/9050.html

Once again life has been quite hectic. I've barely written in my regular journal.. let alone this one.. which I absolutly adore yet constantly forget about.


I'm back in my old apartment, with my old roomate. I have a new job which gives me no hours, and most importantly... I have my cat back. I missed him almost more than anyone or anything else. 



My ex and I haven't spoken much since I left. I've seen him once, when he brought my dresser here. I can't say my life is much different than when it was before I met him. Only now... I know that it's possible for me to pick up and leave. 


Though again my life is very up in the air. I've rekindled with an old flame. One I've always loved and compared everyone else to. I'm hoping to see him in the next week and we can make plans for our life. If not then I'll hopefully be able to get over him, and move on with my life as I always have before. It's deffinatly difficult as I've had lots of spare time to think about him, and us, and everything that goes along with it. I spent all day doing laundry, and cleaning the apartment. It looks great and I'm happy about that... but I have yet to speak with him. I can understand it, there's an emergency in his family, so he needs to be with them, but I cant help but to be impatient. I couldn't even eat. 



I can't sit still..
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/8710.html

Ok so i've been living here for about 6 1/2 weeks.. I absolutly hate it. I'm moving back home on friday when I'm doe with work.Pardon my typing.. i sprained my finger at work today... as if being sick wasn't bad enough.. oh well.

 

 

We broke up. It isnt bothering me... I wasn't very happy. That was making him unhappy.. now that we're broken up.. we're better friends. It goes without saying.

 

A friend of mine proposed to me today and I think maybe he's serious. Seems a bit crazy... but... I dunno. i'm not against it. kinda weird

 

I've learned a lot the past few years. I don't really have regrets.. I have situations which have caused me pain and strife, and heartache (oh so much) but.. I've really learned. I've been to funerals... I've had breakups.. I've done the suicide attempts......I've gained friends..... I've lsot friends.... and form each experience I have learned a new lesson....

 

 

finally.

 

 

 

it seems as if the world is falling down..... but really.. it's just rebuilding
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/8482.html

It's almost time for me to move across the state. I've been moving my things bit by bit, and taking real baby steps. I planned for it that way. I've never lived with someone I was romantically involved with.. neither has he. We both need time and baby steps. Our relationship isn't perfect. I don't think there IS such a thing... even if it was perfect.. that would make it abnormal.. which in turns.. makes it.. imperfect.

 

If that isn't a brain whirl, I don't know what is.

 

I'm feeling a great many things. Not only about this. Not about going back to school. Not about wanting to change majors already. Not the fact that I wasn't invited to go to the bar with my best friend and her "housemates" on her 21'st birthday..... My family. More so my father. I was a daddy's girl... until about 5. Then I became rebellious. I'm of course, joking. My father has been slowly but surely losing his sanity. I really noticed it (meerly from a childs perspective) when my grandmother (his mother) went into a nursing home... several at that. She died in April of 2001. It's then when it became apparent to everyone that dad wasn't quite the same.

 

Only latly it's been more severe. The rest of the family all went on a little weekend trip. My boyfriend even came and we all had a great time. My sister and I got off of an amazing ride we waited all weekend to ride... when we noticed our mom on her cell phone with a look of stress upon her face. It was then when we found out that my father fell asleep at the wheel and crashed, head on, to another car. He went to the hospital but was home within hours. He's fine, but has been playing it off as a joke... he dosen't seem worried about losing his lisense, a lawsuit, if the woman was even HURT. Nothing seems to matter to him. It's like it didn't even happen. He acted like his totaled, smashed car was a prize.. I was wondering if he was going to try to get it mounted on the wall or something. He was even talking about getting a new car which is rediculous as my parents have no money. I can't even ask to borrow some from them. He's being completly unrealistic and it's driving my mother insane. I've been stopping by every day just to add to the sanity in the house (not to say I'm much better). As I walked in the front door now.. I walked in to see my father in his underwear.. rocking in his chair. He thought I was my mother and didn't realize I wasn't for a good minute.

 

 

It's kind of hard to see and watch sometimes. In a way I feel bad for leaving now.. it's such a bad time. But my mother wants me to go.. and I am.

 

 

My head will deffinatly be turned to look behind for a good while.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/8376.html

Ben Folds Five
"Brick"

My own story in parenthesis




6 am day after Christmas (5 p.m week of her birthday)
I throw some clothes on in the dark 
The smell of cold (the smell of rain)
Car seat is freezing (pavement is steaming)
The world is sleeping (the world is driving)
I am numb

Up the stairs to the apartment (Drive through town, get lost on the way)
She is balled up on the couch ( he is late, but soon finds her)
Her mom and dad went down to Charlotte (parents living their own lives)
They're not home to find us out (clueless to our day)
And we drive
Now that I have found someone
I'm feeling more alone
Than I ever have before

She's a brick and I'm drowning slowly
Off the coast and I'm headed nowhere
She's a brick and I'm drowning slowly

They call her name at 7:30
I pace around the parking lot (he paces reception office)
Then I walk down to buy her flowers (she comes out, he grabs her hand)
And sell some gifts that I got (he holds her hand, tells her he loves her)
Can't you see
It's not me you're dying for
Now she's feeling more alone
Than she ever has before

She's a brick and I'm drowning slowly
Off the coast and I'm headed nowhere
She's a brick and I'm drowning slowly

As weeks went by
It showed that she was not fine
They told me son, it's time to tell the truth
She broke down, and I broke down
Cause I was tired of lying

Driving home to her apartment (driving home to our apartment)
For a moment we're alone
Yeah she's alone
I'm alone
Now I know it

She's a brick and I'm drowning slowly
Off the coast and I'm headed nowhere
She's a brick and I'm drowning slowly



been a wonderful week. A lot of hard things I've had to go through. A lot of decisions. A lot of uncertainty. a lot of emptyness... sadness... and the all around feeling of being lost. 

This song is on loop


I am sick.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/8082.html

Again it's been a long time since my last update, and for that I apologize.

 

An amazing amount has changed in my life since my last entry. I wasn't quite sure how to deal with things after my grampa died. Things just got crazy and I began to change.I can't remember everything now, and I'm not going to try. But I will try to sum up some open ends.

 

That last boyfriend was one of the easiest things I've ever gotten over. It wasn't hard in any way shape or form. He was self centered, closed minded, and lacked imagination and had no control over his life. We've spoken a small number of times, but nothing recently.

Because of the breakup and my grandfather's death, I began to realize that life is not necesarilly short.. but it needs to be lived to the fullest extent. Living life with regrets is not a life I want to have. I was sick of work everyday for 10 or more hours for crappy pay, I was sick of being screwed and shafted and abandoned. I didn't want to spend all my days inside working. I never wanted to live a life based on money and making sure I have enough.

 

So I took a risk. I went out with someone. Someone I misjudged. I then began to like him more and more.

 

Lots of in between stuff I can't get into right now.. and two 1/2 months later, I'm going to go back to school, with a major, get a new job and move. I'm going to a school in his town. Not because that's where he lives but because it's one of the best schools in the country. Well.. Not.. School... but.. well.. whatever. They have a great program for what I want.

 

 

I'm really excited but I'm also really fuckin scared. I can't screw this up.. if I do I'll just... be so discouraged! But I'll be ok...

 

 

as long as I sleep tonight...
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/7680.html

My grandfather dies last week... my boyfriend breaks up with me this week because we both have too much baggage?

 

I recently had been trying to explain things to him... to alert him. To let him know that sometimes I wake up in the middle of the night and start crying for no apparent reason.

 

I'm a little bit sad. I'm going to miss a lot about him.. but then again.. there's a lot I won't miss. I had actually been considering this for about a week... he wouldn't go to calling hours.. despite my many, pathetic pleas. He said he would feel uncomfortable. Granted... no one is exactly comfortable with seeing the dead body of a loved one in a fucking box... it's hard. Which is why it would have been nice to have someone there for me. Though what I really remember is that a lot of my theatre friends showed up.

 

 

anyways. I have to go to work. I just wanted to let off some steam.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/7628.html

It's funny. I forget about this thing so much... then suddenly I'm like "Duh! You have another journal! You should write in it!..." So that's what brings me here, my two fine readers...

 

I'm such a downer. I write here only when bad things are happening. A week ago, my grandfather passed away. We kinda knew it was coming... he had a lot going wrong.. but it was still very very sad. Especially to see my gramma. I wish there was more I could do for her. I felt so helpless... we had to do the whole calling hours, funeral thing. It was strange. There was a lot of family there that I hadn't seen in years... us good old irish ones... always so wonderful at keeping in touch...

 

Things with the boy are kinda odd. After the funeral and everything I just.. got a change. A different perspective on life. I don't want regrets. I want to go to NYC. I want to audition for a broadway play... even if I don't get in it (which I won't).. I can at least say I tried...I'm going to stick with it and see if I come around and see him for who I've always seen him as..

 

I'm sure you'll all waiting on the edgeof your seats..
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/7326.html

Well it seems my car isn't totaled after all. Which I admit is a good thing, yet... annoying. See, I've already turned in my plates, and cancelled my insurance. Now I need to do it all over again.

 

But alas there is some good news. I've started seeing someone. Someone good, nice, sweet and actually worthy of my time and emotions. Amazing. I know...

 

He surprised me at work a few times, brought me flowers, and we've been spending a decent amount of time with one another. Not too much, not too little. Which is good. We won't get sick of one another. I hate it when stupid things like that are the cause for a break in a relationship.

 

Easter is upon us. Some of my family is here already. Everyone else will be here today. While I work all day. Though I'm pretty sure I have tomorrow off. That would be lovly. It would be nice to spend time with my family.

 

 

I feel sick a lot. Everytime I don't eat enough... and everytime I eat. Like right now. I haven't eaten anything yet today. It's only 8:45 in the morning. My stomach is twisting and it feels like there's a psychotic gerbel running around in there, my chest hurts, and I have a migrane. It all came on very suddenly. If I eat something... most of that will go away except it'll feel like there's 18 gerbels in my stomach gnawing at everything they can get their little paws on....

 

 

::sigh::

 

 

The funny thing is.. I AM happy. heh. I know it's hard to tell from my entries... but I'm happy.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/7030.html

Oh. Big hint to who I am. I'm Irish. Because there's hardly any of those around. Especially around this time. St.Patrick's Day is just like when someone gets a lot of money. Suddenly you have a lot of family and friends you didn't know about. On St.Patrick's day... everyone is Irish. Even the Claude Ollinger's of the world wear green.

 

Moving on

The whole deal and scare of my last entry was due to stress. I looked it up because it's not the first time it's happened. It made sense. With moving, working my stupid job (which isn't really that stupid, it just pulls my strings the wrong way sometimes). I think the biggest thing was that I was in an accident which totaled my car. It was right in the middle of my policy getting changed. My insurance was going to go down. Three weeks later I find I have no car. That makes me very sad.

 

 

Have you ever found yourself in a position you have no right to be in? My ex is seeing someone new. It's been almost a year. I do miss him. There's a lot about him I still love, and I do still love him, but there was just too much that was wrong and didn't work. I guess this is just the final point. There aren't anymore chances. It's over. That's it


But we move on and I know it's best this way. I'm happy for him. But last night I had a dream that meant jealousy. Oh well.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/6733.html

I was just thinking to myself:

 

"God I wish there was someone I could talk to... who dosen't know me... who's judgement means nothing to me...." Just so I can get this out.

 

and then I remembered this. Not that you don't mean anything to me, but it's different because I'm never going to meet you. I'm never going to know you any other way than this. I'm not going to run into you at the grocery store. We're not going to get seats next to eachother at a hockey game..

 

 

So now I am able to express my huge scare.

 

I'm three weeks late.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/6455.html

It's been a while, and for that I apologize. There's been so much. So much going on, I just haven't really known how to deal. Not all bad things. I've moved. I've been here for about a month. It's going well.

 

Men. They come and go. It's like a god damn revolving door. They leave as soon as they're done. Or they change. And they're gone.

 

I wish things were move obvious.

 

 

Do you ever see a movie? or read a book.. and you're so into it.. you suddenly feel like the actual characters? You feel their pain... their emotions.... you feel the excitement. The Pain. The suffering. The Love. The deceit... you feel it all. And by the time it's over you're exhuasted. It's more than relating... it's feeling the exact same thing. It's sharing the experience. You can taste it.. feel it....it's right there.

 

 

It's strange how life is. How people are all so different yet... exactly the same..
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/6344.html

I forgot about this account. I thought of it as I was about to update my non secretive journal.

 

 

Many things have happened. Good and bad. Christmas came and left us. I spent it alone... though I did get to see some of my family. I started a new job which is going well, My rehersals are going well, and I may be dating someone soon. We're in the "talking" phase. I was surprised to find that he was attracted to me on so many levels. He may be coming with me tonight to my friends house.. and maybe just maybe.. I'll get a kiss at midnight. An experience I've only had once....

 

As much as I don't like new years resolutions.. I'm making one. I'm determined. I have a show to look good for.. a wedding in a few months... and I think that's a big reason why I've been so down on myself and sick latly. I know I've been stressed but I can't use that as an excuse. So that's that.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/5931.html

And indeed it has. It really has.....

 

In a lifetime, countless people can come in and walk out of you life. In retrospect, you can be the one walking out on others. It's a way of life. You move on, they move on, and you forget.

But what happens when you don't forget. And you keep returning to eachothers lives? Despite how many times you're turned your backs.. for whatever reason... you never stopped caring. Though you may have forgotten.

 

Can it be fate? Is there such a thing? Perhaps it's something less dramatic... prehaps... there was no one to turn to. Maybe it was by chance.

 

Whatever reason. I've gained an old friend. This time.. we aren't saying goodbye. I'm going to visit this weekend. It won't be for long. Just a day and a night. I'm excited and exceedingly nervous. All at the same time.

 

I may be moving. One town from here with a friend who has opened his door to my cat and I. It's very sweet of him. He expects nothing from me. When I get a more stable job I plan to pay as much as I possibly can.

 

 

I feel like... everything is almost all ok. My friends have been amazing.... It hasn't really snowed yet... but I can't wait. Christmas music is begining to play and I can't stop smiling....

 

 

 

I sing again
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/5660.html

Surprise! A sad scared depressing entry!.. WEEEE!!!!

 

So I've been getting dates together and I've grown a bit scared.

 

I took a test on the 12'th because I was 2 weeks late. It said negative. It is now the early mornings of the 22'nd and still.. nothing. Maybe it was wrong. Maybe something happened since. Maybe it's some larger force trying to scare me.

 

 

I don't know.

 

 

This has the potential to suck... Especially because... hah. Mr. Man isn't.. well.. dosen't take well to responsibility.. and his girlfriend hates me.. within rights...
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/5475.html

Sometimes you can't help but wonder. Something new will come about and you make a decision. You can either ignore it, or look into it. It's hard though. You never know if what you chose is right. How are you really ever to know? SOmething could turn out bad and you may say "That was a bad decision. I should have chosen____ instead!" But.. what if you chose the best of the two and never knew? Both decisions could be bad... One is just worse. I feel it's worth a shot.

 

I hate being alone at night.

 

 

 

But I guess there's all sorts of things out there........ all around us....... all the time...

 

 

 

Watching.... waiting.......

 

 

 

 

to haunt my dreams...
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/5273.html

I get so fed up sometimes. I'm feeling ok right now. I am rather tired.. and depressed as always.. of course.. like that could ever stop. I'm tired of people pretending to care. Especially if it's for their benefit. If they only do it to make themselves feel better about who they are.. not for the sake of helping.

 

I've been staying up to all hours of the night. I had a breakdown. A good old fashioned breakdown 3 nights ago. I collapsed onto my bed.. curled up into a ball and began to bawl.. harder and harder. It was then when I gave in. I saved my wrists. I went for my stomach, and my sides.

 

Maybe it's because of Halloween.. maybe it's that deep red almost purple nail polish I dropped all over myself as blood... maybe it's because of a story someone told me. Maybe it's because I'm sick of people not beleiving me when I say 'I can't handle being used anymore'... maybe now.. guys who say they're interested in me.. will stop when they see..... maybe then they'll... I don't know. I don't know why I did it. But I know I did it again the next morning when I woke up.. and then again after I took a shower.. and later that night before I went out...

And.. it was.. I don't know. I didn't really.. care for people to know about it. But some found out. It hurt too bad... whenever someone hugged me I would cringe.. when someone would tickle me.. I'd shreik... and push them away... they didn't get it unless I told them that there were gashes there. I tried. I told them my stomach hurt... I told them... I have boo boo's...

 

I saw a picture of his girlfriend. They were entangled in a hug. She was beautiful... tall.. skinny.. long.. straight hair....

 

she sounds really sweet too.. I don't blame him for being with her... I'm sure she's amazing.

 

 

 

It hurts to breathe...
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/4913.html

Strike 412.

I did in fact get the number of one such desired actor. Even talked for over an hour the next day. And again last night! Too bad he has a ... girlfriend. Yes. A cute sweet bubbly girlfriend. Though, we still talked and laughed and had a good conversation. I do think we'll stay friends. Unfortunatly I think that might be it. But that is ok for me. Because he is a very sweet guy.. and we do have things in common. We're making plans to hang out already.  But of course I had to have a nightmare about it last night. There was even a squirrell in it.

I'm starting 2 new shows. Well I'm starting at least one. I have an audition this weekend. I'm going to go broke but I realized.. that... it's something that makes me exceedingly happy. Happier than anything else. To me that makes it worth it.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/4814.html

It's been a while. But I figured I'm in a decent mood I might as well update.

Things are going alright. I'm over those fellas. They're not worth my time. I'm fine to be friends. Though, mr.original can't even really be that. It really is his loss. I'm awesome and I made him laugh a lot. I really don't think people laugh enough... What are ya going to do though?

I have a slight improv job. For halloween. My eyes have wandered toward another actor. I feel his may have met mine a few times. Either he likes me.. or.. is an amazing actor.. If I don't say anything I won't see him again after this weekend. So tomorrow when we're all getting dressed, I'm going to see if he'll hang out with me on Sunday night maybe. God I love Halloween.

 

I finished a painting yesterday. It felt really good. It really did. I felt a big sense of accomplishment as I always do. I had been working on it for a while now.. so I'm glad I got it done.

 

I got my seasonal christmas job back. It's only for a few months but it will deffinatly help me stay focused on getting something better, and more permanent. Like waitressing. I think that would be a good skill to have. Especially if I'm now considering a move to NYC. I really think the creative side of me will come out there. I went to visit a while ago and I sat in an empty apartment for hours, listening to piano music, and writing poetry. Poetry I still read and enjoy now. And maybe then I won't be annonymous to you all. Though I think it would still be fun to have this. I think I'm getting ahead of myself.

 

There. An update.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/4491.html

So the other night I was fed up. The new guy.. is driving me up the wall. Again he says he wants only my friendship and we can't do the "bed thing". He's never done the casual relationship and dosen't want to start. Though he realized he led me on. He wanted to set it right. So we went to a movie. It was decent. Not the best ever. But whatever! We then went to his apartment to catch the yankees game. Started out ok. I was on the couch, he was in the recliner...

....for all of 1 minute.

Then he asks me to rub his shoulders. So I do. Then he rubs mine, I rub his.. we go back and forth throughout the game. He then begins to make out with me and.. I didn't exactly fight it. But when he wanted to go farther I told him to stop and to think. I didn't want him calling me the next day saying he regretted it and bla bla bla. He said "Yes. You're absolutly right" So I was like ok. a few minutes later he goes again. I stop him again. repeat. finally I couldn't take it anymore. ba da bing Still no sex. Don't worry. We don't want that. Neither one of us wants that. Yankees lost. We were pissed. We left. no hug, no kiss, no handshake, no wave... barely a good bye. dah. You would think I'd be used to this. He's gone for another week. I think he has one more week trip.. NEXT week, then he's done. But I guess this weekend is still on for me, him, his daughter, and the care bears. We'll see what happens there. Anyways.

My mother made me call to try and get unemployment. I knew I wouldn't be able to get it but she made me call anyway. Just like everyone said the Temp Agency would work.. I was correct in saying it wouldn't work. I'm broke. And I've been hating life more and more latly. I took a knife to bed with me the other night. I didn't use it. It's still there. I did come close however. I'm a bit rusty. It's been over a year. Meh.

I think I'm going insane. I beleive I have ghosts in my room. It's a good thing this is an annoymous journal.

I have reason to beleive.. my ghosts are my 2 dead friends. There. I said it. All that's lacking from my story is a straight jacket. But.. whatever... I didn't cut. I think whatever story I have is good enough.. being the outcome is no blood.

But yeah right now I'm ok. Though today I'm just kind of sitting around in my pajamas and a sweatshirt. Which is more than I did yesterday. I did this.. and took a nap. Watched the Yanks by myself without a beer.

 

I like that I figured out how to use colors and cool stuff.
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/4160.html

So. New boy decides friendshipo is in store for us. He even suggested going out together to find dates for eachother. I don't know about that, but I am taking up his offer to hang out with him and his daughter next weekend. I may see him tomorrow as well. But next weekend he asked if I wanted to bring over some care bear movies to watch with his daughter, then play on the playground. I'm excited. I love kids, I love care bears, I love playgrounds... and I enjoy her father's company. ha. I'm basically jobless now. I need to work on my resume'. I don't know how to do one. I'm finding things here and there but I know I'll have some trouble with it. All of these people keep telling me they're going to help when I know they just say that to be nice. But it's ok. There's a job I might get. But as I said I need a resume'. I talked to my origianl him. He.. didn't say much. He said he turned his ringer off to relax and be in silence. I'm almost positive there's something he dosen't want to tell me. Though, hey maybe I'm just paranoid. I don't have a reason not to be.. so.. n'yeah. I'm doing a Halloween, improv thing. Despite all the shitty stuff that has been going on, this whole thing just lifts my spirits. I've been working on my costume, figuring out my make up, doing research on-line.. I feel a bit dorky but I'm really looking foward to it. I've done it before. Last year I was stuck inside. I was a charater who didn't talk and was stuck behind a wall. But this year, I'm outside, I can walk around, dance, talk, and actually play with the kids. I'm really looking foward to it. In conclusion: I like Mountain Dew
http://hidden-silence.livejournal.com/3948.html

I had a good day yesterday. I saw some friends whom I don't get to see too often. I've been taking advantage of having the weekend off. 

I went out last night. I guess it was kind of a date. I hadn't met him before, but we've been talking for a while. We went to play pool. We took control of the juke box, and it took us an exceedinly long time to finish one single game. We played 3 or 4 games. Then a round of darts which also took a long time. Before I knew it, it was 1:30 and we decided to go watch our shared love "The Simpsons" at his apartment. He was nervous about inviting me over because he didn't want me to think anything was planned. I didn't care. I thought we were getting along great and didn't want to leave. So we went.

We took the thruway. When I got to the toll booth, my fare was already paid by the gentlemen in front of me. It was only a quarter, but I thought it was sweet anyways. 

I was surprsed by his apartment. It wasn't the bachelor pad I'm used to going to. It was nicely done, neat and clean. He showed me around and we got settled. 


I ended up staying the night. We didn't sleep together. There was some fooling around but deffinatly high school level. He was so.. affectionate. He would randomly squeeze me, or kiss my hair, or my face... Even through the night. And I actually slept. I fell asleep... just after him. 


He sang in the shower this morning. Then he took me to breakfast. He's going out of state for a week now, of course for work. It didn't seem like a one time thing.. and I hope he... I don't know. 



We'll see how this goes. I know I could like him, and at this point, I could walk away from this too. Though.. maybe I don't want to.. I'm going to.. just.. be myself and hope something comes out of it.

I don't know how it happened... I went to see him and his band compete last night. I was going to pour my heart out to him, and tell him I was ready and willing to be with him, and that I wouldn't have it any other way. He was.. maybe.. distant. His mind was elsewhere. I talked to his students more than I talked to him. I TRIED to talk to him. To no avail.. I grew confused. I thought we were going to go grab a bite to eat. It was still early and we hadn't had the chance to see or talk much in the past week. But he said he simply wanted to go home and get his mind off things. Hurt, and confused I reluctantly walked to my car, and watched him screetch his tires and speed away. What had I done? It couldn't have been something I said... I didn't say anything. I knew he was upset about the judges... but I knew there was something deeper. As I started driving and he faded farther and farther away from me, I just began to cry. Slowly at first. As the minutes passed I grew hysterical. Who had I to call? Who could I go to or talk to? My best friend? Who was throwing a party I wasn't invited to? He was the only one I could go to... and yet.. I didn't know if that was right or wrong. With all of my thoughts latly, I decided that I needed him to know what I've been thinking. I told him everything. I told him I was going to open up and that I was ready to be with him. It's the only thing that makes sense to me. I talked and talked for ahwat seemed like hours. Then it was his turn... He basically said that he dosen't have time for himself, let alone.. time for a relationship. He also said that, it scared him to think that I depend on him. Yes. The exact same thing my ex boyfriend said to me on numerous occations. That is the part that stung the most. Especially since he was always the one to get me to talk. He got me in the habit of telling him what was on my mind, and that I could go to him whenever I felt the need... whenever... it.. didn't matter.. My heart was just breaking. I didn't understand. I didn't want to. I wanted to pretend nothing was happening... I wanted to pretend things were how they were before... He told me to write him a letter. So I went home and I did. I started to feel better, and I went off to sleep... only to have nightmares. He was in every one... But one was ok... I dreamed I gave him the letter and he realized that he had made a mistake.. then we were walking around and he kept introducing me as his girlfriend, and holding my hand, and keeping his hand on my back.. and.. I was wondering how I was ever worried... I feel like absolut shit. The low of low's. I just.. I never saw it coming..

I think I went a little insane yesterday... I was on-line as usual, and just.... wanted someone to talk to, maybe, to go somewhere, do something. But as usual everyone was too busy for little me. No one could even spend two seconds telling me that they couldn't do anything. My best friend. I love her to pieces. Our friendship goes back 9 years. We've been through so much and sometimes I wonder how we're still friends. It's hard to explain what she's done. Though I can't hold her to it becasue she didn't realize it. ANd she's sorry now. But the things I've done without thinking. Such as, sleeping with her ex. In fact, I thought he got me pregnant. I told her about it. She was, extremly upset. More upset than I had really seen her. She took a little time to herself and was ok. She even came with me to buy a pregnancy test. We both laughed and sigh'ed a HUGE sgh of releif when I started laughing. ".. No fucking WAY!!!!!" ".. What!?! WHAT!!!!!???" ".. I got my fucking PERIOD!" heh. That's the way our friendship is. Everything is just, halarious. But it's hard. She goes to school at the big university here. I'm so glad. She's 10 minutes away. But.. her mindset is that she's "away" at college. That took me a while to really.. get. She has her friends there. But it isn't the easiest thing to see her. She's a busy girl. She has school, she works, one of those alone would make a person busy. But she's doing both. Her birthday was at the end of August. Last night I still had her presents. I decided to wrap them up and drop them off at her house. I had been scared to give them to her. Well, one thing. I wrapped up a book she let me borrow a while ago, and I made her a big Mix CD of songs we've always loved. Songs from Middle school, high school, and what we love now. For some reason I was able to fit like, 6 hours of music onto a CD... I found that as an added bonus. The thing I was afraid of, was a painting. I painted it for her. But, when it was finished, I wasn't sure if she would like it. I didn't want her to pretend. But then, I knew she would if I was there. I knew she was inside doing work. So I made a plan. My plan was to go leave it on her porch, get back into my car, beep twice, then send her a text message saying "BEEP BEEP! Go to the porch. Happy 20" I thought it was insanly clever. I pulled up and of course, She was walking outside with one of her housemates. DAMNIT! I told her what I had planned and that, I didn't care if she didn't like it but I didn't want to be there when she opened it. I handed it to her, and we said good bye. She called a bit later asking "How could you think I wouldn't like something you made?" I was.. actually speachless. She loved it! SHe said she was staring at it trying to find all of the hidden things in there. SHe was also very excited about the CD. Especially when she realized there were 5 pages of songs.. I love her. I honestly do. I miss her too though.. almost mroe than I love her. But I'm glad I have her..

I'm feeling very alone, and lost latly. Maybe I have right to be, maybe I don't. I can't tell anymore. I'm so used to me feeling this way without reason, I'm never sure if it changes. The feeling itself is never old. Everytime I'm down it feels like it's the lowest I've felt. "Every day is a little bit worse than the day before.. Everyday, is the worst day of my life" Some day I don't feel a need to get up and do something. I do anyway. I set an alarm and get myself up, dressed, and go somewhere. Be it to take pictures, or pay bills, or go to a mall, a store, anywhere. Just to get out and do SOMEthing. Because I know, if I sit in my pajamas all day, watching tv, playing on this damn computer, I know I'm going to hate everything about myself by the end of the day. I usually do anyway, but it's only worse if I have nothing to show for an entire day. Sometimes I think that maybe I shouldn't have broken up with my boyfriend. I wasn't exactly.. happy and I knew that we weren't right for eachother, but, he never allowed me to feel this way. At first I could but then he got tired of it. We would be in bed at night and I would cry, he wouldn't pay any attention to me. I would cry harder because he didn't care. But then I didn't want to keep him awake so I just quieted myself. But, now that we aren't together.. he's been doing the things he knows I love. He's been listening and trying to be there for me. But, I just. I beleive he's only doing that so I think I was wrong and would come crawling back to him. He did kiss me after. But that might have just been because, it's been so long. But something out there tells me that.. there IS someone better for each of us out there. Maybe I've found him already, I'm really not sure. That would make things a lot easier. In some ways I guess. I want so much. I want to.. I want to be one of the girls. No one thinks of me as that. Everyone thinks I'm someone else. I may not be the girliest person in the world. I don't get my nails done or dye my hair... I don't really like shopping... But I like kitties, and puppies, and babies... I like pink.. and.. singing and dancing. I fit in more with guys than girls. I notice that. A lot of my friends are older and married. When we all get together, the wives and women are in one room talking, and gossiping... I'm in the other room with the men watching family guy, and laughing about how women talk so much and have to go to the bathroom in pairs. There's a part of me that just.. Maybe if I had gone to college. But I just, I can't see myself on a campus. I can't see myself trying to fit in with people, and trying to find my "group" of friends. People would try to be nice but, I can see through all that. How am I supposed to find myself? How am I supposed to go anywhere... WHY AM I HERE!?!?!?!!?!?!!

I'm afriad another entry filled with sadness, depression, and anxiety are upon us. My fellow readers. I don't belive I have any thus far. Today had the potential to be an ok day. However I was wrong. I went with a friend to see another friend of ours, play with his band. That was alright. I saw some old friends. Enjoyed myself. The friend I went with, latly, has been making things extremly akward for me. He brings up things. He's always liked me. I admit. I led him on, not realizing the full.. well... I didn't realize how much he was interested in me. This was also back when I had the lowest self esteem in the world and basically, well. TO be perfectly blunt, I was a bit of a slut. But it's not like I went out looking for it. I think guys tend to realzie that. THey know what to say.They take advantage of it. I eventually got used to it. It's like when a child gets abused by it's parents, in a lot of cases, they grow to do the same to their children. It becomes natural and.. "home". I actually used to be very religious. My faith was so strong nothing could break it. I stood my ground, let people know what I beleived in. I didn't care because I knew what was right and things would be ok for me forever, because I beleived and I had faith. How blind I was. Things in my home life turned sour. A lot has been blocked and I wish so bad that I could know what went on. I remember things here and there, but I was too little. It started when my older sister was in college. She was going through some things and would get very upset, very easilly. I remember there was always yelling, and screaming and crying, and throwing, and pushing and hitting... as I grew older, subconsciously that's what I looked for in who I dated. And I found it. A month before I turned 17 my (at the time) boyfriend, decided he COULDN'T be with a virgin. So he decided it was his duty to take it from me. And he did. I cried. In case you're wondering I did break up with him. Only after trying to reason with him. After that, I had a secret fling with someone 10 years older than me. I went on to date an alcoholic with a 2 year old. He left me for his ex fiance' a week after Valentine's day. He did come crawling back to my doorstep when she turned around and did the same thing to him. Of course I went to his house that night and we of course, went on to have sex. I don't call that making love because.. it wasn't. There was never any love involved in that. Last year I met someone who was extremly forceful and never gave me time to think about anything. Everytime I saw him, he beat down my self esteem. He would make me feel like the biggest idiot on the planet. Everything I said and did was wrong. I was never right. I didn't talk enough to his friends. I was getting TOO nice to his friend. He wouldn't allow me to wear tight, or revealing things. And I had to have sex with him, at every waking moment. It got to the point where I would cry. Hysterically. He would then yell at me because my crying made him feel bad. That all ended when we had one final fight. It was in October. At 2:00 in the morning. He had taken the coat I was wearing. I was left in short sleeves. It was snowing/hailing. I was freezing. Tears were freezing on my cheeks. He yelled at me, again for crying. Then again for shivering. He said I should be used to the cold because that's what my heart is. Cold. He wouldnt let me speak. Even if he could I wasn't able to. To this day. It's the most intimidating thing I can recall. He towered over me by a foot. He was twice my size. Could easilly pick me up over his head. I was fearing for my life. He was insane. I was searching for a place to run. My car was so close, but he was in between us. He stood right in front of me. Kept pushing me, and pushing me. harder each time. I don't know why. But finally he let me go. and I was gone. I drove, and cried. I thought I was going to die. I thought he was going to kill me. I've. I've been through a lot. I can't even remember where I was trying to go with this but.. It feels good to be able to get this all out. It's been a while since I've been able to really talk about it. I was going on about how.. well. How I've done some things I regret. But I do think that, I'm generally a good person. We all have our shadows and spider webbs in our closets that are locked up and sealed tight. I'm not trying to give myself an exucse. I think excuses and reasons are two completly different things that often get confused. There's so much I want to say but, the words just won't come. I'm scared I guess. Of a lot. I have an interview I should be sleeping for. I'm falling head over heels for someone. And I'm.. afraid of what my future has in store for me. that's it..

He is a teacher. He teaches music. He also lends his hand to a marching band. Yesterday they had a competition. He asked me to come see it.


I took the 40 minute drive after work.


I didn't get to see him until after they went on. I had an enormous sense of pride for these kids. I know how much he loves them, and how much he enjoys working with them. In seconds I could understand why. I don't know if it was from the cold, or, maybe because I hadn't eaten all day. But I had tears forming behind my eyes. 


I walked around the feild to where they were supposed to exit. I stood waiting for him to see me. He turned around and stopped. Then he smiled and said "Hey you.." and came over. We hugged and I told him how excited I was and how amazing they were. He had to leave for a few moments, but when he returned we walked. 


I met a lot of people. Kids, Parents, Teachers, wives.. they were all exceptionally nice and wanted to know how we met. He was thrilled to tell the amusing story, and the listener also showed their enjoyment. 


We went out to a little restaurant/bar, afterward. None of them seemed to care that I was underage. They didn't realzie it either. They simply thought I didn't drink. But for once in my life.. it wasn't important. They still talked with me, and I may be jumping to conclusions, but I feel as if I fit in. 


I was pulled in by his conversation. His passion, his.. charisma. Everything. I was drawn to him. I couldn't stop staring at him, and smiling. 


It was... an amazing night. Next week there's another competition near me. I want to go. 



We left the bar late. CLose to 1. 


We went to a diner. Just the two of us. We were in seperate cars but, he called me and we talked the whole way there. We drove by the place we met for the first time. We both said something about it.



For some reason I really just didn't want to see him go. I know it'll be another week before I can see him again. I know that isn't long. I just wish there was a way we could be clsoer together. He lives about three hours away from here. But his family lives here. So he stays with them when he comes. 


I kept hanging on to him. Not wanting to let go. I rested my head on his chest, he rested his head on mine, and we stood. Arms wrapped around eachother...



oh. How I wish this were easier... But I guess it woulnd't be worth it then, right?

I need a drink. An extremly strong drink. The kind that deserves a tiny sword with a cherry on the end of it. Maybe I could just throw one of those in there anyway. I beleive all drinks should be entitled to having a miniature sword, with a cherry poked onto the end. That would make the drink much more satisfying. Sometimes I wish I was smarter so I could be farther in life than I am. I truly am afraid of people. Everyone expects so much from me. I feel it's a great accomplishment that I even finished high school. I don't think many people in my position could have. I lost my grandmother and a friend by his own hand. I tried to kill myself. I had several doctors, and my guidence councelor holding me in these plastic bubbles. I was on medication. I was failing. I was skipping classes. I never did my work. I don't know how I got out of there. Two months after graduation I was raped by my boyfriend. I broke up with him. I at least did ONE smart thing for myself. I tried college. I failed every class. Haven't been back since. I decided I needed to accomplish more important things. I had to get away from the yelling, and screaming, and crying of my house. I got a good job. I moved into a crappy apartment with 2 annoying, dirty, lying roomates. I bought a car. I was doing ok. I got laid off. Lost my job. And both of my roomates decided to leave. Another thing I've failed at. just add it to the list My parents weren't going to let me move back in. To tell you the truth I didn't want them to. I was prepared to live in my car. My sister made my parents "welcome" me back. I've been mooching off of them ever since. Though I hate taking money from them and I lie when they ask if I need any. I know they'll just hold it against me later. I want so much just to be able to leave this place. I want to go away from everyone. I love my friends but I don't ever see them. So it wouldn't matter if I was here or not. I need to get away. I'd love to live with him. But I know that's not an option right now. For one, my car wouldn't be able to handle the winter months. Two?... actually I think that's about the only reason...

I arrived late. It was nice to know he went out looking for me. I pulled into his driveway shortly after he did himself. I threw myself on him, and we hugged, and I beleive he kissed my forehead. We walked inside. I feel at home when I'm there. He explained he had more work to do than he thought, and would most likly be up all night. I wasn't too happy. But that's because I'm selfish and wanted him all to myself. We spent a bit of time cuddling on a tiny chair. We ended up kissing, and rolling around on the floor, Laughing, and smiling sweetly. We would tickle one another every now and then. Sometimes I still think it's wrong. I forget that it isn't. In fact, I'm not sure if anything has ever been more right. We ate pizza. I ate with my hands, he ate with a fork and knife. We smiled and spoke with our minds silently across the table. I fell asleep on the couch as he worked. I awoke at 2 a.m to him touching my face lightly, asking if I wanted to go to bed. He finished his work earlier than expected, and had already taken a shower and was in his boxers and a t-shirt. We spent a lot of time talking. As always. He touched me up and down. He held me tight and made me laugh. He's the only one who can make me smile like that. We made love for the first time. He had never done so before. I have been with 7. I still can't help feeling a bit ashamed. But it dosen't matter to him. But, in all of those times.. I've never had such an enjoyable, fun, romantic time. I got a bump on the head from a board that was laying on the top of the bed. It fell down on me and brought tears to my eyes. Yet, we spent the rest of the night sleeping in eachothers arms. I can't help but feel that I'll never figure my life out. Some say my life has been a lot harder than others. Then again.. some say my life has been a lot easier as well. I am well aware that I have issues. That's nothing I've ever tried to hide. In fact, I tell people out flat when I meet them that I'm not what they're going to expect. There's a whole other side to me that no one knows. I've had this image of being a sweet, smart, all around good girl. When, in all reality it's exactly the opposite. I've never really enjoyed school. I may seem sweet and innocent and in some ways I am. But there are plenty of things that would cause my family to disown me. And sometimes I feel that wouldn't be the worst thing that could happen to me. my head is killing me...
